main event: 660 objects were observed moving side by side over Cape May, New Jersey, on 12 September 1954.
interesting points: The objects were of 1st magnitude and were seen to travel in groups of 15-20,The sighting lasted for approximately 3 minutes,The objects moved straight or maintained their course throughout observation,There was no confirmation through aircraft analysis available,Weather conditions were clear with visibility over 15 miles.
witness description: Civilian, visual observation from the ground
